title: No Escape?
description: When Mari, Jayden, and Alicia won't stop their constant fighting, their parents decide to take them to an escape room where they must work together to solve the puzzles in order to get out. No Escape? is an engaging story that teaches students about teamwork, cooperation, and creative thinking. Students will enjoy trying to solve the puzzles right along with the characters! This book can also be used to teach students how to analyze plot as well as how to make, revise, and confirm predictions.
